Note

  • Every accepted article should be registered by at least one author to appear in the proceedings/Journal.
  • Every accepted article should be registered by at least one author to appear in the proceedings/Journal.

If you have any question regarding registration, please contact our conference conveners via ncartificialintelligence2020@gmail.com

Registration Policies

  • Registration will be valid only upon receipt of the full payment according to the given deadline.
  • Each participant must register separately.
  • Student rate is applicable only for those who attach their valid student ID card copy during registration and for students who are FIRST Author.

Guidelines For Registration

Registration includes ALL the following events to be completed by author within a fore-mentioned deadline:

  • Camera Ready Article (MS word file).
  • Scanned copy of filled in Copyright Forms (Authors Only).
  • Proof of studentship (valid on date of submission of the manuscript) for availing Student Registration (if applicable).
  • Scan of registration fee pay-in-slip/voucher of online transfer/Demand Draft (DD) (whichever applicable).

Note: Send the original DD (write your paper ID in the back side of the DD) by post so as to reach the following address

Dr.P.Selvi Rajendran
The Convenor, NCAI 2020
Department of Computer Science and Engineering,
Hindustan Institute of Technology and Science,
Rajiv Gandhi Salai (OMR), Padur Chennai - 603 103.
Ph: 044-2747426 Ext: 140 Mobile: 8637635755
Email: ncartificialintelligence2020@gmail.com selvir@hindustanuniv.ac.in

Sustainable, Secure, and
Smart Collaboration Workshop

The Sustainable, Secure, and Smart Collaboration (S³C) workshop is meant to connect researchers, industries, educators, and technologists involved in different and diverse areas connected to HCI blended with immersive systems, smart cities, and security awareness which can take advantage of the collaboration.
